EmailTemplate.name: 30 day overdue reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: {!c2g__codaInvoice__c.c2g__Account__c}: Invoice Reminder from American Student Assistance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.c2g__CODAFinanceContact__c},
This is a friendly reminder to let you know that Invoice # {!c2g__codaInvoice__c.Name} for ${!c2g__codaInvoice__c.Invoice_Total__c}0 for {!c2g__codaInvoice__c.c2g__Account__c} was due on {!c2g__codaInvoice__c.c2g__DueDate__c}.
Please remit payment as soon as possible. If you have already sent the payment, please disregard this message. If not, we would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.
If you have any remittance questions or need another copy of the invoice, please feel free to contact Finance A/R at accountsreceivable@asa.org.
Your business is very important to us!
Sincerely,
American Student Assistance Finance Accounts Receivable Team accountsreceivable@asa.org
